document_data.name: Grand Stairs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grand Stairs''' were part of the [[Horseshoe Temple Oasis]] in the [[Quoya Desert]] of the [[Hordelands]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The stairs formed the entrance into the entire cave face. They were carved from the bedrock and at one point were lined with statues. As of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, all of the statues had been shattered with their broken remains laying on the ground surrounding the statues.
